rationale: Greeting and establishing the context of the conversation.
Providing proof of the data taken.

text: > These files were taken from your network prior to encryption. You can pick 2-3 random files from the list and we will upload them to this chat as a proof of possession. rationale: Describing the situation and proposing a method for proof of possession and decryption capability.
